SerialDataClear.description: This action is used to clear Serial Interface data.
SerialDataClear.longDescription: This action shall perform a clear of Serial Interface data.

SerialDataExport.description: This action is used to export Serial Interface data.
SerialDataExport.longDescription: This action shall perform an export of Serial Interface data.

title: #DellSerialInterface
